sentences.en: Hidden dangers lurk in every family home.
sentences.cn: 每个家庭都存在潜伏的危险。

sentences.en: It is my contention that death and murder always lurk as potentials in violent relationships.
sentences.cn: 我的观点是，在暴力关系中总是潜伏着死亡和谋杀的可能。

sentences.en: Cookies, however, have a darker side too, and all kinds of privacy issues lurk at every bend.
sentences.cn: 然而，网络 cookies 也有其黑暗的一面，各种隐私问题潜伏在每一个角落。
